description.japanese: 『アドベントシナーズ』第一部を完了

description.english: Torn apart by the bear-like shadow
description.japanese: 巨大な影の熊に腹を裂かれる
description.schinese: 被巨熊般的大影子开膛破肚
description.tchinese: 被巨熊般的大影子開膛破肚

description.english: Clashed with the claws of the crow-like shadow
description.japanese: 黒いカラスの爪に衝突

description.english: Blasted into charred fragments by white projectiles
description.japanese: 白い光の弾により焦げた破片になる
description.schinese: 被白色光弹轰成焦黑的碎屑
description.tchinese: 被白色光彈轟成焦黑的碎屑

description.english: Shot through the heart by Ophelia
description.japanese: 心語に心臓を射抜かれる

description.english: Crushed on the floor by an unknown object
description.japanese: 未知の物体により床で潰される
description.schinese: 被未知物体碾碎在地板上
description.tchinese: 被未知物體碾碎在地板上

description.english: Crushed on the bed by an unknown object
description.japanese: 未知の物体によりベッドで潰される
description.schinese: 被未知物体碾碎在床上
description.tchinese: 被未知物體碾碎在床上

description.english: Annihilated by the soldier who was used as a door barrier
description.japanese: ドアのバリケードとして使われた兵士によって、全滅させられた
description.schinese: 被用作挡门板的士兵全歼
description.tchinese: 被用作擋門板的士兵全殲

description.english: Ambushed by assassins on the road
description.japanese: 大道に潜む殺し屋に囲まれて殺される
description.schinese: 被埋伏在大路的杀手围歼
description.tchinese: 被埋伏在大路的殺手圍殲

description.english: Eaten clean by a pack of wolves
description.japanese: 狼の群れに完全に食べられる

displayName.english: Strange Monster in the Strange Space

description.japanese: 「怪物」に何度も殴られ、血塗れになる
description.schinese: 被“怪物”轮番殴打，血肉模糊
description.tchinese: 被“怪物”輪番毆打，血肉模糊

description.english: Battered by "monsters" next to the dark-red humanoid figure
description.schinese: 在暗红色人形旁边被“怪物”轮番殴打
description.tchinese: 在暗紅色人形旁邊被“怪物”輪番毆打

description.english: Chased and cornered to death by enemies from all directions
description.japanese: 前後の追跡者に追い詰められて死ぬ
エレベーター内で壮絶に全滅

description.english: Fell straight down from more than 20 floors
description.japanese: 20階以上から直接地面へ落下
鉄槌で胸を突き抜かれる

description.english: Smashed into pieces by the sledgehammer

description.japanese: 鉄槌により首を落とされる

description.japanese: 『アドベントシナーズ』第二部を完了

description.english: Lost consciousness due to the bewitching black explosion
description.japanese: 魔性の黒い爆発によって意識を奪われる
description.schinese: 被魔性的黑色爆破夺走意识
description.tchinese: 被魔性的黑色爆破奪走意識

description.english: Lost consciousness due to the eerily atmospheric black structure
description.japanese: 気味の悪い黒い構造によって意識を奪われる
description.schinese: 被气氛吊诡的黑色结构夺去意识
description.tchinese: 被氣氛吊詭的黑色結構奪去意識

description.english: Knocked to the ground by Wayne Brooks's mantra missiles
description.japanese: 江外安の真言ミサイルによって地面に吹き飛ばされる
description.schinese: 被江外安的真言导弹炸倒在地
description.tchinese: 被江外安的真言導彈炸倒在地

displayName.english: Turned to Ash in One Blast

description.english: Killed on the spot by a direct artillery hit in a crater
description.japanese: 砲火の直撃で弾痕内で爆死
description.schinese: 被炮火直击炸死在弹坑里
description.tchinese: 被炮火直擊炸死在彈坑裡

description.english: Killed outside the drain by a direct hit from a flat trajectory artillery fire
description.japanese: 平射砲の直撃により排水溝の外で爆死
description.schinese: 被平射炮的直击炸死在排水沟外
description.tchinese: 被平射炮的直擊炸死在排水溝外

description.english: Riddled with bullets by the Uzi submachine gun
description.japanese: ウージー短機関銃の連射でふるいにされた。
description.schinese: 被乌兹冲锋枪的扫射打成筛子
description.tchinese: 被烏茲衝鋒槍的掃射打成篩子

description.english: Squashed into a bloody pulp by the strike of the giant monster
description.japanese: 大きなモンスターの掌によって血の泥にされる
description.schinese: 被大怪物的掌击拍成血泥
description.tchinese: 被大怪物的掌擊拍成血泥

description.english: Companions were exterminated by the terrifying light bullets

description.tchinese: 同伴被恐怖的光彈趕盡殺絕
